remarks: A formula for ` log ^ 2 ( N ) ` in terms of the primes.  Equation 10.4.6 of [Shapiro], p. 418.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-May-2016.)
statement:
logsqvma $p |- ( N e. NN -> sum_ d e. { x e. NN | x || N } ( sum_ u e. { x e. NN | x || d } ( ( Lam ` u ) x. ( Lam ` ( d / u ) ) ) + ( ( Lam ` d ) x. ( log ` d ) ) ) = ( ( log ` N ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
$d N d u x $.
